channel.title: New form of highscores
channel.description:
Well, a development I made :rolleyes:
I've always hated it how the highscores are in-game. So, I thought, "What if i made them out of all around characters- and not connected to MySQL?".
That's just what i did today ;)
[size=14pt]Features:[/size]
[ul][li]Has top10 ranks from all characters, offline & online.[/li] [li]Loads mostly the same way as before, but instead from a text file.[/li] [li]The text file is updated, the person of that rank is moved down, and the last person is kicked off of the list.[/li] [li]100% Accurate, set up to reload every time a player levels, logs out, logs in (in-case of DC), or disconnects.[/li] [li]Important: Doesn't lag, one bit :eek:[/li][/ul]
Ill post pics soon.
P.S. Post your opinion on this, please no flaming, and please tell me if i should make a TuT on this :)

item.title: New form of highscores
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Rene eats waffl3z:

I’m not sure about this, But wouldn’t it load faster from a mysql database? o.O

Yes. It would be much faster to load from a database.

Read full topic

That’s just what i did today

[ul][li]Has top10 ranks from all characters, offline & online.[/li]
